forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 52. West wind around 14 mph.

forecast.name: Saturday
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 62, with temperatures falling to around 60 in the afternoon. West southwest wind 12 to 20 mph, with gusts as high as 24 mph.

weather_report:
In the quiet hours of the morning, Downtown San Francisco awakens under a canopy of partly cloudy skies. A gentle west wind whispers through the streets, its cool breath hinting at the changes to come. As dawn unfolds, the city stands poised between the misty embrace of the bay and the bright promise of the day ahead. With temperatures dipping to a calm 52 degrees, all is serene, though a gentle hint of briskness invites layers of warmth.

As the sun rises higher, the forecast promises a gentle embrace of warmth, heralding a sunny Saturday. Expect a peak around 62 degrees, with an afternoon coolness retreating the temperature to around 60. Those wandering the streets will feel the cheerful dance of a west-southwest wind, reaching gusts that playfully tug at loose clothing. Today, the fog—often the city's eternal companion—will linger less, allowing sun-kissed vistas to shine, particularly towards the Golden Gate. As shadows stretch and clarity enhances, the day invites leisurely strolls through parks or cozy café visits, enjoying a warm beverage while gazing at the unfolding spectacle of summer. Dress wisely: a light jacket in the morning, perhaps some layers that can be shed as the sun claims the afternoon. The city awaits, vibrant and invigorated—a perfect palette for everyday wanderings.
